headline: NextEra Energy, Inc. (NEE): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on NextEra Energy, Inc. on The Passive Income Portfolio’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on NEE. NextEra Energy, Inc.’s share was trading at $83.63 as of January 19th. NEE’s trailing and forward P/E were 26.55 and 21.05 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
